Release Notes:
Updates to support 7.4 spring release include the following:
​
1- User with the ability to edit and submit a QPR, will be able to choose the option to copy Q2 to Q3 on the summary page; ​
​
2- User with the ability to edit and submit a QPR, will be able to start filling out QPRs for 2020 Q3 (between 07/16 and 8/17);

3- User with the ability to edit and submit a QPR, will be able to fill out QPRs for 2020 Q2 and 2020 Q3 (two quarters are open);

4- User will be able to switch between quarters directly on the Dashboard web page.
Title: Grants PA | QPR Special Release | 7.15.2020

Release Notes: 1. User will have the ability to submit RFR's within DRS.
Title: Grants PA | Cannot submit RFR - Fix | 7.15.2020
